panels.description: Past prediction made by the prophet prediction model

targets.rawSql: SELECT "time", value AS "Node Index", createdat FROM past_prediction WHERE $__timeFilter(createdat)
SELECT avg_usage_cpu * total_cpu / 100 AS "Node Index", "time" as time FROM metrics

panels.title: Current and predicted Node Index

panels.description: Describes the accuracy of the prediction model.

targets.rawSql: SELECT error AS "MAPE", createdat "Time" FROM past_prediction_row WHERE $__timeFilter(createdat) ORDER BY createdat

panels.title: Mean absolute percentage error
